data.Header: You see a corpse lying on the ground.
data.SuccedHeader: You find some coins in the dead's pocked.
data.FailHeader: The sleeping Undead awakes and in a quick move scratches you!

data.Header: A pity beggar asks you for some coins.
data.SuccedHeader: The beggar smiles and banishes, in the floor you see something.
data.FailHeader: You give the beggar some coins.

data.Header: You see a fountain with glowing water.
data.SuccedHeader: You feel your body grow with energy.

data.Header: An injured dog approaches to you.
data.SuccedHeader: The dog seems to be grateful.
data.FailHeader: The dog tries to bite you, but instead breaks your coin pouch.

data.Header: You see bubbles coming from a puddle.
data.SuccedHeader: You find a couple of dirty gold coins.
data.FailHeader: Your hand gets covered in a very disgusting liquid... It hurts in your wounds.

data.Header: You are starving. You see a very appetizing mushroom growing on the mud.
data.FailHeader: A bit spicy, weird taste, repugnant texture... A nauseating sensation invades you.

data.Header: While exploring the dungeons, you hear screams. Someone is being tortured.
data.SuccedHeader: In a fast move, you incapacitate the guard and free the man being tortured.
data.FailHeader: When trying to help, you get caught.

data.Header: A floating light sphere appears blocking your path.
data.SuccedHeader: The sphere stops shinning. You feel rejuvenated.
data.FailHeader: The shining sphere fades, and with it, you feel your pouch loss weight.
